name: Bike Championship - Xtreme Racing Game For Free
name_original: Bike Championship - Xtreme Racing Game For Free
description:
Welcome to world of SPEED and world champions race. SBC-2K16 is bike championship racing simulator that lets you play and feel the closest as you can actually riding the most powerful superbikes, and the game's diverse camera perspectives contribute to enhance realism in bike racing game 2016. SBC-2K16 offers responsive controls, nice graphics, and a variety of tracks, all for. Let’s burn up the track in this free racing game 2016.
Don't expect any other superbikes championship or bike racing game when you're playing and enjoying Sports Bike Champion ship (SBC 2K16). The bike model you start out with is pretty basic in sbc2k16. As you progress, you'll get better, more powerful motorbikes from virtual purchasing shop. Select your monster bike from huge range of motorbikes.

To keep things interesting, SBC 2K16 offers various modes and options in bike champion ship arena. There are two racing challenges, Moto Racing Championship mode and Knockout bike racing mode. There are many other options about game play, you can set difficulty of racing challenge by changing No. of opponents bikers, and by changing No. of laps. There are more than 5 closed loop next generation racing tracks.
In sbc2k16, Bike handling is superb, as for playability, Sports Bike Championship is not especially difficult to control, as long as you get used to a somewhat strange UI combination. Easy to get into, and the controls can be managed by even the very young.

SBC-2K16 is an accurate representation of the Superbike real racing challenge and offer the most realistic motorcycle racing game experience on mobile. If you love motorcycle racing games and are craving a bit of real action and thrill, Sports Bike Championship (SBK Championship 2016) should definitely be your next move.

Features:
- Family Friendly motorbike racing game
- Real superbike racing game
- Huge range of riding options
- Accessible for beginners
- Real Super Bike Racing Experience
- Maximum control flexibility
- Enhanced physics engine
- Multi camera views
- Detailed environments with many variations
